scripts.start-add: node index.js add --title="Things to buy" --content="Just to test body content of a note"
scripts.start-add2: node index.js add --title="Things to buy v2" --content="Just to test body content of a note"
scripts.start-add3: node index.js add --title="Things to buy v3" --content="Just to test body content of a note"
scripts.start-remove: node index.js remove --title="Things to buy v2"
scripts.start-read: node index.js read --title="Things to buy v3"
scripts.start-inspect: node inspect index.js add --title="Things to buy" --content="Just to test body content of a note"
